dimensions: H: OM034 W: OM396 L: OM397
title: Tray
provenance: Bought in Paris, Compagnie des Jndes in 1869; Gift of Mrs. Max Farrand
description: Flat bottom, with slightly curved, raised edge, forming scalloped pointed four-lob. Inside of bottom and both sides of edge covered with conventionalized hammered floral motives.
name: Tray
